mapper.select: select m.* , u.uname from messages m, users u where receiver=#{receiver} and u.uid=m.sender order by mid desc;
select m.* , u.uname from messages m, users u where sender=#{sender} and u.uid=m.receiver order by mid desc;
mapper.insert: insert into messages(sender, receiver, message) values(#{sender}, #{receiver}, #{message})
